name: Garden Paws (itch)
description:
Thanks for your interest in Garden Paws! 

We have a public free demo available for anyone and everyone to play, share and enjoy! The demo is not limited by time, but does not contain all the features we have. The demo has a limited amount of quests that result in 2-4 hours of questing gameplay, but you can continue exploring the world and running your shop past that.

If you enjoy the game please support us on kickstarter, so we make the game even better.

Please note, the demo will not get updates other than bug fixes, so there will be no multiplayer, fishing or other features that will be in the full game.

You can download the demo below.
